-- Megatron / Switchblade --

Megatron grins easily as the Tripred leader addresses him, "Somebody 
is thinking above thier position in the universe. Too bad you won't 
live long enough to learn why I only need 1 name, Megatron."

Megatron hops backwards off of the ship, and onto the wing on that 
side it as the light bolts spray over his last position. He ducks, 
and prepares for his attack, fully aware that he was still damaged 
from the previous battle.

His weapons armed, he pops up from the wing, and fires two plasma 
blasts and a rocket at Tryrael. Then he prepares to change location.

"Switchblade." Megatron says through a comm, "Found anything yet?"

------------------------------------

Switchblade grimaces then replies, "Uhh, I found something in a 
box... it was trapped with an older model false top/explode-in-your-
face style trap. I managed to disarm it... the hard way, and I'm a 
bit damaged now. There appears to be a piece of... something anyway."

Switchblade picks up the artifact, and takes a closer look at 
it. "Hmm, it almost looks like a small cube, which is the corner of 
a larger cube of some sort. There also appears to be writing on it, 
possibly Vok, but I can't tell. There are also three small 
miscoloured squares in the center of three of the sides of it."

He takes a look around the room, and spots three more sealed 
containers, identical to the one he'd grabbed the oddly shaped cube 
out of.

"Hold on, I'm checking out three more containers which are seemingly 
identical to the one which had this.. thing in it." Mumbles 
Switchblade into the comm and he heads over to the next sealed 
container, his intrest smothering the pain of his damages, and also 
the fact that Megatron was in the middle of a battle.


> Tyrael: I see you have come Megatron. Now come. You will learn why 
> they call me the Blue Firestorm!
> 
> He showered his enemy with a rain of light bolts, no bigger than 
> needles.
